title: Astral Dynamics - A NEW Approach to Out-of-Body Experiences.pdf
description:
Synopsis
A guide to participation in out-of-body travel. The author provides advanced advice on achieving and maintaining out-of-body states and explores the how and why of non-physical exploration, from projection techniques and energy manipulation to psychic self-defense and even astral sex.

From Amazon.co.uk ...
Don&#039;t you love it when you pick up a book, and it immediately explains experiences you&#039;ve had, but had no explanation for when they occurred? This doesn&#039;t happen often, but it might with Astral Dynamics, Robert Bruce&#039;s straightforward how-to manual on astral projection. Perhaps you&#039;ve had a spontaneous out-of-body experience and didn&#039;t know it! This extensive tome teaches the reader everything she or he needs to know to accomplish successful planned out-of-body travel; how to exit the body, how to get around on the astral plane, and how to get back in with solid, provable memories of the event. Bruce is a very clear writer who uses down-to-earth terminology so that you learn not only how to create a "real-time double" to astrally project, but he painstakingly explains the physics of the non-physical world so that it makes complete sense. Out-of-body experiences can be so confusing that enjoying them or employing them usefully can be a serious problem. Fortunately, Bruce now brings his 25 years of inter-dimensional experience to the aid of astral explorers the world over, and everywhere else, too.

-- P. Randall Cohan
